scripts.lint: turbo run eslint stylelint typecheck syncpack --continue
scripts.eslint: eslint . --ignore-pattern apps --ignore-pattern packages --ignore-pattern internals --ignore-pattern internal --max-warnings=-0 --cache --cache-location node_modules/.cache/eslint
scripts.clean: pnpm -r --parallel --include-workspace-root exec pnpm dlx rimraf dist storybook-static .turbo .playwright .rslib node_modules/.cache
scripts.reset:delete-node-modules: pnpm -r --parallel --include-workspace-root exec pnpm dlx rimraf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
